titleStmt.title: Psalmes, sonets, & songs of sadnes and pietie made into musicke of fiue parts: whereof, some of them going abroad among diuers, in vntrue coppies, are heere truely corrected, and th'other being songs very rare and newly composed, are heere published, for the recreation of all such as delight in musicke: by William Byrd one of the Gent: of the Queenes Maiesties royall chappell.
Psalmes, sonets, and songs
titleStmt.author: Byrd, William, 1542 or 3-1623.

titleStmt.title: Psalmes, sonets, & songs of sadnes and pietie made into musicke of fiue parts: whereof, some of them going abroad among diuers, in vntrue coppies, are heere truely corrected, and th'other being songs very rare and newly composed, are heere published, for the recreation of all such as delight in musicke: by William Byrd one of the Gent: of the Queenes Maiesties royall chappell.
Psalmes, sonets, and songs
titleStmt.author: Byrd, William, 1542 or 3-1623.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Thomas Este, dwelling in Aldersgate streete, ouer against the signe of the George,

notesStmt.note: Five partbooks, each with separate dated title page and collating [A]² B-F⁴ G² . At head of title, part 1: "Superius."; part 2: "Medius."; part 3: "Contratenor."; part 4: "Tenor."; part 5: "Bassus.".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
